body: You should add a `Operator` to `register_prim_ops.cpp` that implements `prim::None`. Like `prim::Undefined` but it should `return IValue()`.  This should never get emitted due to dead code elimination, but there may be some corner cases.
body_html: You should add a Operator to register_prim_ops.cpp that implements prim::None. Like prim::Undefined but it should return IValue(). This should never get emitted due to dead code elimination, but there may be some corner cases.
body_text: You should add a Operator to register_prim_ops.cpp that implements prim::None. Like prim::Undefined but it should return IValue().  This should never get emitted due to dead code elimination, but there may be some corner cases.
